Hi,

Can you explain what information you need.
Creating the report is not =
difficult:
You run your testsuite with Ant's JUnit task, and create a repor=
t 
with the JUnitReport task.

More info on IBM developerWorks Automating t=
he build and test process:
http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j=
-junitmail/
Read the Automating data reports section.

Regards, Jan
